title: "The future of beverages: Robot bartenders and reusable soda bottles"
excerpt: "Over the past 20 years, St. Paul-based BevSource has grown into a leading supplier of packaging, ingredients and services for the beverage industry. Numerous global brands, regional breweries and local THC seltzer makers have in some way relied on BevSource to get their products on shelves."
